scripts.copy-lc-comp: npx shx mkdir -p ./libs && npx shx cp -fr ../../node_modules/monaco-editor-comp/dist ./libs/monaco-editor-comp
scripts.copy-monaco-workers: npx shx mkdir -p ./libs && npx shx cp -fr ../../node_modules/monaco-editor-workers/dist ./libs/monaco-editor-workers
scripts.copy-monaco-editor: npx shx mkdir -p ./libs && npx shx cp -fr ../../node_modules/monaco-editor ./libs/monaco-editor
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-lc-comp && npm run copy-monaco-workers && npm run copy-monaco-editor
